Complete one task. Use an appropriate text type from the options below the task you choose. Write 70
to 150 words.

1.   You are the president of the school drama club. The club is going to put on a performance
     of a play next week. Write a text to remind the students in the club about the next practice.
     Include information about the time and place of the practice, what they should bring to it, and
     what they can do at home to prepare.

                 Invitation                        Message                     Social media posting


2.   You planned to visit your grandparents next month, but unfortunately you can’t go. Write a
     text for your grandparents about the situation. Explain what you wanted to do on the visit,
     why you can’t go, and how you feel about this.

                   Email                           Message                     Social media posting


3.   You want to celebrate a special occasion with your friends at a theme park. Write a text to

     changes you propose for homework, the daily schedule and school lunch.
